name: Stronger Together After Death
description:
Killed in a tragic accident, you make your way through the underworld to try and gather back your senses and put yourself back together to become STRONGER TOGETHER. During this journey you are hunted by jealous and vengeful souls determined to keep you where you are...

All assets and music made by myself.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021 (Stronger Together) 'against' clckn who uploaded Slipstream Racer!
